name: 英語演講：英語簡報
restrict: ◎必須先修過【ENU0269  英語會話（一）】、【ENU0270  英語會話（二）】 ◎課程開放上修
goals: To help students learn effective techniques to control nervousness
To help students learn the art of mind-mapping, brainstorming, and outlining
To help student learn how to critique many presentations

methodologies.note: Students will learn to critique each other`s presentations.
Students will work with each other in class on different speeches.

prerequisite: Prerequisite course: 【ENU0269  English Conversation (I)】、【ENU0270  English Conversation (II)】 ◎Available for junior and senior year B.A. program students (Doctoral program courses excepted) and M.A. program students.
